php并发写文件|文件锁

Sep 12, 2014

php并发写文件|文件锁


$fp = fopen("b.txt", "w+");

if (flock($fp, LOCK_EX)) { // 进行排它型锁定
    fwrite($fp, "Write something here\n");
    flock($fp, LOCK_UN); // 释放锁定
} else {
    echo "Couldn't lock the file !";
}
fclose($fp);

php文件锁
